tweets.text: It never ends does it? The relentless morale-beating that comes from living in a country with an environmental protection body as broken as the @EnvAgency https://t.co/K2Ub0hL4vc

Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy

This week, we‚Äôve visited #WalleysQuarry to assess @RedIndustries2 progress on the required capping works. 

We expect Red Industries to complete that work today. 

See our webpage for further updates and air quality information. https://t.co/6B9i1x2fA0

#NewcastleUnderLyme https://t.co/GengkU8LDM

@PHE_WestMids @davemh72 @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe You have advised @EnvAgencyMids that the symptoms are transient and acceptable.But the odour is almost every night & gets trapped indoors,therefore dramatically increases exposure time. How is this accounted for? And what about mental health? #stopthestink
@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency Another day for you and me in paradise.

@Tus_M_ @ClareDinnisEA @robbiedyson @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @StaffordshireCC And why does it still stink ?  And why won‚Äôt you stop them poisoning us ?
Solutions please

@ClareDinnisEA @robbiedyson @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @StaffordshireCC Why not, instead of answering the easy questions, let us know if the capping has been completed as per the enforcement notice, or if waste collections has resumed at Walley‚Äôs Quarry? #stopthestink
@Tus_M_ @PHE_WestMids @davemh72 @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids How can any symptoms be ‚Äòacceptable‚Äô? #stopthestink

It's worth pointing out @EnvAgency mission statement says  "It's our job to look after your environment and create better places for people and wildlife."  Clearly, that's rubbish! https://t.co/x3lwcWupJ8

Educating responders @WestMidsFire @WMFS_OLPD about our duty to help protect the environment üå≥ üå∏ üêÅ from #hazmats and other materials. Equipment provided by @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency but deployed by the fire service. https://t.co/T6tXQbY8Fz

Please listen now @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest @kiergroup This COULD be a fantastic project but you need to do the work at the correct time of year and NOT during the breeding season. Thanks @ChrisGPackham for the support and fingers crossed they see sense. https://t.co/En5Y1I6Rts

It is. It is astonishing. But it is and @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice know it. So does @StaffordshireCC @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids Thank You @DJAndyMoor for your support and voice @StinkStopthe https://t.co/cikerfAUTU

@Samanth33412592 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL @Cap_it_off Keep pushing and fighting! Log everything with your GP, log all complaints in email and be prepared to engage solicitors as this is where we are at now. There is a long road still ahead of us

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL why can‚Äôt this be done here ? Nothing is been done it‚Äôs not getting better for us, this can‚Äôt continue, we have babies on ventilators hospitals gassed out, schools full of gas #StopTheStink #CloseItDown #AirPollution @Cap_it_off https://t.co/D7hOEXCtVF

tweets.text: @DJAndyMoor @HelenVi00175623 @djlange @StinkStopthe You could also highlight that landfills are a nationwide nuisance and must go! #mullaghglass landfill in #belfast #northernireland has been leaking #landfillgas for over 2years now exposing residents & environment to #hydrogensulphide #methane many have ended up in hospital

@BorisJohnson @WelshConserv Enjoying the fresh air in Wales @BorisJohnson ? Come and sort this toxic gas from Whalley‚Äôs landfill site ASAP or we won‚Äôt be breathing for Voting Day! Do you realise how serious it is? India need oxygen but we need it right here too! #stopthestink #greenpeace @PHE_uk @EnvAgency
